txt.en: Destroyed Orc bows ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Taurogrim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated TBD
The orc reinforcements have arrived! You are forced to retreat!
You hear some commotion coming from the floor above
Pick up the Summoning Horn

'Good, we made it in unseen. Here, take more of these.'

She hands you another pouch of small explosives.

'If we want to do as much damage as we can, we need to abandon stealth for firepower! Destroy as much of their weapons and armour as you can before we're caught! Don't worry, I'll get us out of here before we're overrun.'
Use the Call Ausma skill and talk to Ausma
Destroy Orc swords ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroy Orc spears ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Well done, [placeholder]! Let us return to Annâk-khurfu!'
Find the ramp to the second floor
Talk to Ausma
Defeat Quartermaster Khorglam
TBD
Sneak past the drunk Orcs to the third floor
Destroyed Orc armour ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroyed Orc weapons ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat the Taurogrim in Grazadh-gropor.
Destroy Orc bows ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat TBD
Scout-master Ausma has discovered the Orcs' stockpile of weapons and armour and wishes to destroy it!
Talk to Ausma
Mission: Attack on the Armoury
Defeat Quartermaster Khorglam
Defeated Taurogrim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'We're running out of time. There's just too much here to destroy by ourselves! And, we've run into a few Orcs, but where are the rest? A fort of this size must have more soldiers, even if they were preparing to move... wait, do you hear that?'
You have reached the third floor

'Did you hear that? That must have been the quartermaster. It sounds like all the missing Orcs are upstairs, and drunk! Change of plans, [placeholder].\n\n'I say we sneak upstairs and off the one in charge before the rest of the Orcs sober up and realize we're here destroying their supplies. Without the quartermaster, these Orcs won't be organized enough to continue their plans to move everything into Gundabad, and I can send other scouts in to continue the work. Let's move!'
Use the summoning horn at the entrance to the fort to summon Ausma to your side.
You should talk to Ausma.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Ausma is missing, and the Call Ausma skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
Destroy Orc weapons and armour in Ashmâr-zarakh with Ausma.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Ausma is missing, and the Call Ausma skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>

You have destroyed many weapons and suits of armour, but the fort is just too large to destroy it all.

You should talk to Ausma.

<rgb=#FF0000>If Ausma is missing, and the Call Ausma skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>

You have heard some commotion coming from the floor above you.

You should find the way up to the second floor.

<rgb=#FF0000>If Ausma is missing, and the Call Ausma skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
Defeated Quartermaster Khorglam
'That takes care of that! Hmm... I am surprised we haven't run into the Quartermaster yet. I wonder where he's hiding? Wait, do you hear that?'

You should talk to Ausma.

If you somehow become separated from Ausma, use the summoning horn at the fort entrance to summon her to your side.

<rgb=#FF0000>If Ausma is missing, and the Call Ausma skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>

You have learned that all of the missing Orcs are upstairs, and drunk!

You should sneak past the drunk Orcs and find the quartermaster.

<rgb=#FF0000>If Ausma is missing, and the Call Ausma skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
'What's going on down here? Are you lot all drunk? When Gorgar hears about this, he's going to feed you worthless maggots to the Wargs!'

You have reached the third floor of the fort.

You should find and defeat Quartermaster Khorglam with Ausma.

<rgb=#FF0000>If Ausma is missing, and the Call Ausma skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
'No, I don't want any! Get back to work!'
You hear an Orc shouting upstairs
Use the summoning horn to call Ausma
Defeated Quartermaster Khorglam
Talk to Ausma
Destroy Orc armour ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroyed Orc swords ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroy Orc weapons ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroyed Orc spears ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'What was that? Let's find a way to get upstairs.'
'Hah! Too easy! Still, we should leave here before these Orcs sober up.'
